title: Koishita node Cast shitemita
original_name: 恋したので配信〈キャス〉してみた
sinopse:
Yuu Inuzuka is unable to make any friends due to his mean face and awkwardness. But because of his enrollment to high school, he has the opportunity to enter the dorms. However, it was a share house between 6 people, 3 girls and 3 boys filled with secrets!?

(Source: COMICSMART, translated)
